name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Pesticide contaminated soil ; Ex-situ remediation Cement kiln co-processing ; Excluding soil excavation process
修复后土壤;农药污染土壤;异位修复;水泥窑协同处置;不含土壤挖掘过程

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Solid waste that meets the requirements for kiln entry will be put into the cement kiln to achieve harmless disposal of solid waste while producing cement clinker.
将满足或经过预处理后满足入窑要求的固体废物投入水泥窑，在进行水泥熟料生产的同时实现对固体废物的无害化处置过程。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: we defined the functional unit as the remediation of 1 ton of organically contaminated soil

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The study site was an abandoned rubber factory in Jiangsu Province in eastern China.The total in situ volume of contaminated soil that required remediation was 29,313 m3
研究场地是中国东部江苏省的一个废弃橡胶厂。需要修复的受污染土壤的现场总体积为29313 m3

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: For the cement kiln co-processing scenario, the cement plant selected for contaminated soil disposal is located 49 km from the study site and has two dry process rotary kiln production lines with a daily clinker output of 5000 t. The screened contaminated soil would be transported by truck to an air-tight storage warehouse at the cement plant for temporary storage, then subsequently fed into the pre-calciner via a special conveyor belt. Raw meal in the pre-calciner reaches temperatures up to 700 ◦C, at which the contaminated soil would be dried and heated before entering the rotary kiln. The flame temperature in the rotary kiln exceeds 1800 ◦C, which is highly efficient for converting PAHs to H2O and CO2. The inorganic components in the contaminated soil would be fully incorporated into the clinker at a temperature of 1450 ◦C and subsequently cooled in the clinker cooler for incorporation into the cement production process.

水泥窑联合处置，用于污染土壤处置的水泥厂位于距离场地49公里的地方，有两条干法回转窑生产线，日产熟料5000吨。经过筛分的污染土壤将用卡车运输到水泥厂的气密储存仓库进行临时储存，然后随后通过一个特殊的传送带送入预煅烧炉。预煅烧炉中的生料温度高达700◦C，受污染的土壤将在进入回转窑之前被干燥和加热。回转窑内火焰温度超过1800◦C，这对于将PAHs转化为H2O和CO2是非常有效的。受污染土壤中的无机成分将在1450的温度下完全融入熟料中◦并随后在熟料冷却器中冷却以结合到水泥生产过程中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is intended for the ex-situ remediation of pesticide-contaminated soil using cement kiln co-processing. This technique applies to soil requiring detoxification and stabilization, capable of being processed at high temperatures without prior soil excavation. It suits industrial facilities, such as cement plants with appropriate kilns that can integrate soil remediation into their clinker production line, resulting in both cement clinker and remediated soil.
此过程用于农药污染土壤的异位修复，采用水泥窑协同处置技术。适用于需要解毒和稳定化的土壤，能够在高温下处理，无需先进行土壤挖掘。适合具备适宜窑炉的工业设施，如水泥厂，它们可以将土壤修复整合到熟料生产线中，从而同时产出水泥熟料和修复后的土壤。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tian L ,Mingchao H ,Lu Y , et al. Life cycle assessment-based decision-making for thermal remediation of contaminated soil in a regional perspective [J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2023, 392
Tian L ,Mingchao H ,Lu Y , et al. Life cycle assessment-based decision-making for thermal remediation of contaminated soil in a regional perspective [J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2023, 392

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of contaminated soil remediation, attention should be given to the system boundary defined as starting after the excavation and screening of the soil, while still on-site. Do not include the initial excavation process. Consider the energy consumption, transportation to the cement plant, waste gas emissions, and waste management. Ensure technological applicability by matching remediation requirements with the capabilities of the selected cement kiln, particularly the temperature profile necessary for the complete decomposition of organic contaminants and incorporation of inorganic components into the clinker.
在使用该数据集进行污染土壤修复生命周期评价（LCA）时，应注意系统边界的定义，即始于土壤被挖掘和筛选后仍留在现场之后。不包括最初的挖掘过程。要考虑能源消耗、运输至水泥厂的过程、废气排放和废物管理。确保通过与选定的水泥窑的能力相匹配来验证技术适用性，特别是完成有机污染物的完全分解以及将无机成分融入熟料所需的温度曲线。

completeness.common:other: The system boundary extends from the beginning to the end of remediation and includes material acquisition, energy consumption, transportation, waste gas emission, and waste disposal. Unlike most contaminated soil remediation LCAs, which begin at contaminated soil excavation, we set the system boundary to begin after the contaminated soil was excavated and screened but remained onsite
系统边界从修复的开始延伸到结束，包括材料获取、能源消耗、运输、废气排放和废物处理。与大多数从污染土壤挖掘开始的污染土壤修复LCA不同，我们将系统边界设置为在污染土壤被挖掘和筛分后，但仍留在场地内后开始。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: For the cement kiln co-processing scenario, the cement plant selected for contaminated soil disposal is located 49 km from the study site
与大多数从污染土壤挖掘开始的污染土壤修复LCA不同，我们将系统边界设置为在污染土壤被挖掘和筛分后，但仍留在场地内后开始。
